metadata.synopsis: Note: T|his dialogue has a lot of copies of certain branches for cinematics purposes. Do not try to condense without speaking to writer or cinematics! Lae'zel confronts a tiefling that has seen another githyanki. She tries to prise the information from him with intimidation, perhaps insisting he bow to show proper deference. Key emotions: Lae'zel is arrogant and fearsome; Zorru is afraid she will attack, but tries not to show it - at first.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Have Laezel in your party- Go to the Grove- Separate Laezel from the party and use her to talk to Zorru. (Make sure the other party members are far enough away so the dialog only happens between Laezel and Zorru!)

18.speaker: Zorru
18.context: CinematicNodeContext: The tiefling raises his weapon half-heartedly.

14.speaker: Narrator
14.text: *You recall the child from before. This man is Zorru; he has seen other githyanki.*
14.context: CinematicNodeContext: The tiefling raises his weapon half-heartedly.

60.speaker: Zorru
60.text: My f-friend's blood not enough? Come to rip me open, too?
60.context: CinematicNodeContext: The tiefling raises his weapon half-heartedly.

75.speaker: Lae'zel
75.text: On Crèche K'liir, a proper greeting begins with a bow.
75.context: CinematicNodeContext: The tiefling pauses, then bows slightly.

16.context: CinematicNodeContext: The tiefling pauses, then bows slightly.

65.speaker: Lae'zel
65.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tiefling marks player's map with exact location.

1.speaker: Zorru
1.text: On the road to Baldur's Gate, near the mountain p-pass. I'll sh-show you.

56.speaker: Zorru
56.text: It saw us 'fore we saw it. Jammed its blade through Yul's belly, straight to the other side.

44.speaker: Zorru
44.text: And I just... I just ran.
